src:
Ekspresi Kocak dan Haru Ketika Pertama Kali Cicip Makanan
05 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Foto: istimewa

Jakarta - Di samping foodies yang banyak mencicip aneka makanan, ada orang-orang yang justru belum pernah mencoba jenis makanan tertentu. Ekspresinya ada yang kocak dan mengharukan.Tidak semua orang pernah menyantap apa yang biasa Anda makan. Sebut saja para bule yang tentu belum familiar dengan rasa durian. Lalu ada juga yang belum pernah menjajal enaknya milk tea karena keterbatasan keuangan. Karena pengalaman pertama, tentu saja ada ekspresi unik yang ditunjukkan orang-orang ini. Ada yang berekspresi senang tapi ada juga yang menahan muntah karena tak doyan. Berikut ini beberapa ekspresi unik yang ditunjukkan orang-orang ketika pertama kali mencoba makanan maupun minuman. (dvs/odi)


Foto: istimewa

1. Pertama Kali Makan Daging Ada orang yang terbiasa makan daging, bahkan jadi santapan harian. Tapi ada juga orang yang seumur hidupnya belum pernah merasakan kelezatan daging sapi. Pengalaman pertama makan daging dialami oleh Pak Slamet, seorang pemulung di Jakarta. Pria ini mengaku baru pertama kali makan daging. Santapan paling mewahnya adalah daging ayam, itupun sangat jarang ia santap. Ketika pertama kali mencoba daging sapi, Pak Slamet sampai menitikkan air mata. Ia makan dengan terharu sekaligus bersyukur karena bisa merasakan enaknya daging sapi. Baca juga : Cicip Durian Untuk Pertama Kali, Cewek Korea Ini Langsung Ketagihan

(dvs/odi)



Foto: istimewa

2. Pertama Kali Cicip Rendang dan Ayam Geprek Pengalaman ini dirasakan oleh orang Korea yang pertama kali mencoba rendang dan ayam geprek. Dua makanan ini pastilah familiar di lidah orang Indonesia karena sudah biasa menyantapnya. Youtuber asal Korea Selatan bernama Noona Rosa membuktikan sendiri kelezatan rendang dan ayam geprek. Noona juga mengajak dua temannya untuk merasakan enaknya ayam geprek. Orang Korea ini juga mencoba tempe goreng, tahu isi, ayam geprek, nasi goreng dan rendang. Meski baru pertama kali mencoba makanan Indonesia, mereka menganggap rasanya enak. Tahu isi juga dibilang mirip dengan camilan khas Korea.

(dvs/odi)



Foto: istimewa

3. Pertama Kali Cicip SushiMakanan Jepang yang satu ini banyak disukai orang, tapi ada juga yang belum pernah mencobanya. Sushi dengan topping salmon ini jadi sushi pertama yang dicicip, tapi sayangnya sushi ini tak bisa ditelan. Ia justru memuntahkan salmon yang baru saja masuk ke mulutnya. Pria asal Malaysia ini menyantap sushi karena ditantang oleh teman-temannya. Ia diiming-imingi uang kalau berhasil menghabiskan sushi. Salmon mentah memang terkadang jadi momok menakutkan bagi orang-orang yang belum pernah menyantap sushi maupun sashimi. Video yang merekam aksi makan sushi ini kemudian menjadi viral di media sosial. Banyak orang justru punya pengalaman serupa ketika pertama kali mencoba sushi.

(dvs/odi)



Foto: istimewa

4. Pertama Kali Cicip DurianDurian jadi makanan yang kerap jadi tantangan bagi banyak orang, terutama bagi orang di luar asia tenggara. Selain bule Eropa, Youtuber asal Korea Selatan juga penasaran dengan rasa durian. Alhasil, mereka mencicip durian untuk pertama kali. Buah eksotis ini dicicip ketika sedang berada di Malaysia. Aroma dan rasa durian yang khas ternyata tak menjadi hal menakutkan bagi keduanya.Saking doyannya, dua wanita ini sanggup menghabiskan sebutir durian utuh. Aksi ini pun diunggahnya lewat chanel youtube dan berhasil mendapat banyak respon netizen. Wah ternyata rasa durian tidak terlalu mengerikan ya.

(dvs/odi)



Foto: istimewa

5. Pertama Kali Cicip Milk TeaEkspresi bahagia bapak tua yang satu ini menuai banyak komentar. Senyumnya mengembang ketika baru pertama kali mencoba milk tea. Minuman yang banyak digandrungi anak muda ini ternyata jadi minuman langka dan mewah bagi orang kurang beruntung. Salah satunya bagi penjual sapu yang berusia senja. Ia merasa sangat beruntung ketika diberi kesempatan mencoba milk tea. Berlokasi di Filipina, bapak tua ini dibebaskan memilih minuman yang ia mau. Ketika mencicip minuman ini, ekspresinya sangat bahagia. Ekspresi polos dan jujur ini pun menjadi perbincangan publik dan mengundang haru. Baca juga : Minum Milk Tea Pertama Kali, Kakek Penjual Sapu Ini Viral

(dvs/odi)
text:
Hilarious and Haru expression when you first taste food
05 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Photo: special

Jakarta - In addition to foodies that taste lots of foods, there are people who have never tried certain types of food. His expression is hilarious and touching. Not everyone has ever eaten what you used to eat. Call it the Caucasians who are certainly not familiar with the taste of durian. Then there are also those who have never tried the delicious milk tea because of financial limitations. Because of the first experience, of course there are unique expressions that these people show. There are happy expressions but some are holding back vomiting because they are not fond of it. Here are some unique expressions that people show when they first try food or drink. (dvs / odi)


Photo: special

1. Eat Meat for the First Time There are people who are accustomed to eating meat, even a daily meal. But there are also people who in their lives have never tasted the delicacy of beef. The first experience of eating meat was experienced by Mr. Slamet, a scavenger in Jakarta. This man claimed to be eating meat for the first time. The most luxurious meal is chicken meat, and even then he rarely eats. When he first tried beef, Mr. Slamet came to tears. He ate tearfully and was thankful because he could taste the delicious beef. Also read: Tasting Durian For the First Time, This Korean Girl Is Addicted Directly

(dvs / odi)



Photo: special

2. The first time tasting Rendang and Geprek Chicken This experience was felt by Koreans who first tried rendang and geprek chicken. These two foods are certainly familiar to Indonesian people because they are accustomed to eating them. Youtuber from South Korea named Noona Rosa himself proved the delicious rendang and geprek chicken. Noona also invited her two friends to taste the delicious geprek chicken. This Korean also tries fried tempeh, tofu contents, chicken geprek, fried rice and rendang. Although this is their first time trying Indonesian food, they think it tastes good. Tofu contents are also practically similar to Korean snacks.

(dvs / odi)



Photo: special

3. First Time Tasting Sushi Japanese food this one is a lot of people like, but there are also those who have never tried it. This salmon topping sushi is the first tasting sushi, but unfortunately this sushi can't be swallowed. He just spewed salmon that had just entered his mouth. This Malaysian man ate sushi because he was challenged by his friends. He was lured by money if he succeeded in spending sushi. Raw salmon is sometimes a frightening specter for people who have never eaten sushi or sashimi. The video that records the action of eating sushi then becomes viral on social media. Many people actually have a similar experience when you first try sushi.

(dvs / odi)



Photo: special

4. First Time Taste DurianDurian is a food that is often a challenge for many people, especially for people outside Southeast Asia. Besides European Caucasians, South Korean Youtubers are also curious about the taste of durian. As a result, they tasted durian for the first time. This exotic fruit was tasted while in Malaysia. The distinctive aroma and taste of durian turned out not to be frightening to both of them. So fond of him, these two women were able to spend a whole durian. This action was uploaded via the youtube channel and managed to get a lot of responses from netizens. Wow, apparently the taste of durian is not too terrible huh.

(dvs / odi)



Photo: special

5. First Time Tasting Milk Tea The happy expression of this old man reaped a lot of comments. His smile expanded when he first tried milk tea. The drink that many young people love turns out to be a rare and luxurious drink for the less fortunate. One of them for the broom seller who is old. He felt very lucky when given the opportunity to try milk tea. Located in the Philippines, this old man is free to choose the drink he wants. When tasting this drink, his expression was very happy. This innocent and honest expression also becomes a public conversation and invites emotion. Also read: Drinking Milk Tea the First Time, Grandfather Selling this Broomstick Viral

(dvs / odi)
